Title: Osimhen, Lookman, three other Player of the Year winners tipped to light up AFCON semis
Summary: CAF tipped five Player of the Year winners to light up the semi-finals of the 2025 African Cup of Nations in Morocco . Osimhen, Lookman, three other POTY winners also tipped to be in the semis . The semi-final matches will take place in the 2025 AFCON .

Title: Nigeria, UAE sign strategic trade agreement
Summary: Nigeria and the UAE have signed a Comprehensive Economic Partnership Agreement (CEPA) The agreement is expected to transform economic ties between the two nations . Minister of Industry, Trade and Investment, Dr. Jumoke Oduwole, disclosed this in a statement .

Title: When style hurts: the hidden problem with everyday jewellery
Summary: When your favourite earrings leave your skin red, itchy or sore, it stops feeling like style and starts feeling like a problem . Jewellery signals identity, culture, mood, status and self-expression .

Title: Ex-presidential aspirant dumps APC, cites failed governance
Summary: Dr SKC Ogbonnia announced his resignation in a letter addressed to the APC chairman of the Owelli/Amoli/Ugbo/Ogugu ward in Awgu Local . The former presidential Aspirant cites failed governance as the reason for his resignation .

Title: Navigating Life #2: the 12-week year
Summary: The 12-week year is a more human way to plan your year, one that allows you to evolve as you go, instead of forcing January’s version of you to run the whole show . Navigating Life is the series where I explain how I plan my life .

Title: US Embassy reopens redesigned American Center in Abuja
Summary: The United States Embassy in Abuja has officially reopened its newly redesigned American Center located at the Embassy Chancery, reaffirming the strength of U.S.-Nigeria relations .

Title: Insecurity: Vacate Kainji lake area within two months Niger govt tells residents
Summary: Niger govt has given two-month notice to people living in hamlets around Kainji Lake to vacate the area . The Niger government has given the people living around the lake area two months notice . The people will be resettled by the Emirate Council .

Title: ‘I want to be a wife’ — 48-yr-old singer Tamar Braxton
Summary: American singer and actress Tamar Braxton has expressed her frustrations over being single at 48, lamenting that she should be married by now . The 48-year-old said she wants to be a wife .

Title: I receive threats over tax reform implementation —  Taiwo Oyedele
Summary: Taiwo Oyedele says he faces life-threatening situations due to his role in implementing comprehensive tax reforms in Nigeria . He made the revelation on Tuesday in Abuja during a governance colloquium organized to celebrate the 50th birthday of Hajiya Hadiza Bala .

Title: More migrants are dying in ICE detention under Trump
Summary: The confrontation tactics used by US Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) have been in the spotlight since the fatal shooting of protester Renee Nicole Good in Minneapolis, Minnesota, on January 7 .
